name: WP eCards
author: eCardWidget LLC

sections.description:
Embed a branded ecard or ecard gallery into your website for visitors to share via email or social media.

Ecard Widget Branded Ecards is a quick and easy way to add professionally designed, fully branded ecards to your store.

You’ll have complete control over the ecard, background, and layout. Add your logo, website, links, designs, etc. Choose from our gallery of professionally designed ecards or design your own. Embed the ecard on your website. Then click the ecard, personalize it, and click send!

This plugin is brought to you by eCardWidget, the leading provider of customizable eCards for businesses and nonprofits.

Popular Use Cases

Check out our Popular Use Cases to see how our eCard Widget can be used to enhance engagement and drive results. View now to see real-world examples of how businesses are using our widget to connect with their audience in new and innovative ways. Click here to see use-cases

Features

  • Share and create custom branded ecards for your business
  • Reliable email delivery, avoid spam filters, and deliver with confidence
  • Get BCC’d on all ecard emails sent
  • Track sender and recipient email addresses (Export to CSV)
  • Choose from our gallery of Ecard templates
  • Customize your ecard email layout to fit your brand
  • Shortcode to list ecards from selected widget
  • eCard designer
  • Mobile Responsive
  • Animated GIF Support
  • Emoji Support
  • Organize your eCards and re-order your images
  • Adjust dimensions of your thumbnails and images
  • Send Ecard to Facebook friends
  • Background color change for layouts
  • Multi-Language Support: French, German, Dutch, Spanish, Hebrew, Polish, etc.
  • Custom CSS support
  • Stats / Analytics
  • Batch upload

Installation

  • Download and install the plugin manually or using the WordPress admin.
  • Login or sign up for free.
  • Create your widget and add ecards.
  • Then share ecards, and embed them into your website to be shared by others.
  • Done!

Showcase

Check out live examples of websites using this plugin:

Business / Marketing / Fun

  • Raising Canes
  • Dwayne The Rock’s Teremana Tequila
  • Harbor Vet Appreciation
  • Mathmos Lava Lamp Inventors
  • Discover California Wines
  • Midatlantic Climbers
  • Besitos

Categorized eCard

  • Comfort Company
  • Lutheran Living Greeting Gallery

Churches

  • Vineyard North Phoenix

Non-Profits / Fundraising

  • Habitat for Humanity
  • Maryland Food Bank
  • Van Wert Health
  • Youth For Understanding Thank Yous
  • American Patriots Unsung
  • Project Sleep
  • CureCancer Christmas Thankyou
  • Jewish Agency
  • Point Defiance Zoo Vday
  • Canadian Downs Vday
  • Wildlife Preservation

Fundraising

  • Onetail Puppygram Vday
  • The Humane Society
  • Wounded Warriors

Employee Recognition

  • Impact Ventures
  • Modivcare
  • Circalogica
  • Zephora

  • Lifetalk
  • Live in Great Falls
  • Peace Winds America
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin, search for WP eCards and click “Install now”
  2. Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of wp-ecards.zip to your plugins directory, which usually is /wp-content/plugins/.
  3. Activate the plugin
  4. Authenticate the plugin with EcardWidget.com
sections.changelog:
1.2.9

  • Major update with UI integration

1.1

  • Major bugfixes to make setup more stable and easy

1.0

  • Initial release – expect more to come!

short_description: With this plugin you can customize your ecards and send via email and social media.
